means: 充满大事的，多事故的，多变故的

sentence.Network_en: Our next journey was longer and much more eventful.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们接下来的那次旅行时间更长，更加丰富多彩。

sentence.Network_en: Her eventful life included holding senior positions in the Colonial Service.
sentence.Network_cn: 她一生经历丰富，曾在殖民服务局担任高级职位。

sentence.Network_en: The coming autumn should be eventful.
sentence.Network_cn: 未来之秋将是多事之秋.

PerfectNetExp.abs: That ends this strange eventful history ., 结束这个奇怪的多事的历史.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... conventionality n 老一套；习俗 eventful a 变故多的 eventual a 最终的.
新编大学英语单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... doll n. 玩具娃娃 eventful a. 重大的， 重要的 expectant a. 期待的, 怀有希望的.
词根联想记忆法词汇教程(三)|联想记忆法背单词 ... even adj. 偶数的，平的 eventful adj. 重要的，多事的 eventual adj. 最后的.

list.abs: 往是什么意思_百度知道 ... [contact;intercourse;dealings] 去和来;往来 [past events] 往事;陈迹 [come and go] 去和来.
麦芮蜜 ... pictorial 写真摄影作品 hot events 热门活动 latest news 最新资讯.
高考英语作文技巧 ... 32.在除夕 on New Year’s Eve 34.时事 current events 37.考试及格 pass an examination.
石油英语词汇(E4)_专业词汇_英文阅读网 ... event stratification 事件层理 event time 事件时间 event tree 事故树.

entry.tran: 经历丰富的;多事的;充满事件的;多变故的
entry.def: If you describe an event or a period of time as eventful, you mean that a lot of interesting, exciting, or important things have happened during it.

example.ex: Her eventful life included holding senior positions in the Colonial Service...
example.tran: 她一生经历丰富，曾在殖民服务局担任高级职位。

example.ex: It was an eventful and controversial race...
example.tran: 那是一场充满变数而且颇具争议的比赛。

sentences.sentence: "the most exhausting and eventful day of my life"

auth_sentence.content: It has been an eventful few months for Escher Group.
auth_sentence.res_content: It has been an eventful few months for Escher Group.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It has been an eventful few months for Escher Group.

auth_sentence.content: The changes which fourteen eventful years had produced.
auth_sentence.res_content: The changes which fourteen eventful years had produced.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The changes which fourteen eventful years had produced.

auth_sentence.content: End of a brief and always eventful stay in England.
auth_sentence.res_content: End of a brief and always eventful stay in England.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: End of a brief and always eventful stay in England.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 重大的,重要的,多变故的
stems_affixes.word_buile: event[n.事件,事情]+ful充满……的→事件多→多变故的
event[n.事件,事情]+ual……的→出事之后[最终]的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 善于发明或创造的,有发明或创造才能的
stems_affixes.word_buile: invent[v.发明,创造;捏造,虚构]+ive……的→adj.善于发明或创造的,有发明或创造才能的
prevent[v.[from]预防,防止,阻止,制止,妨碍]+ive……的→adj.预防性的
eventual[adj.最后的,结局的,最终的]+ly表副词→adv.最后, 终于
eventual最终的+ity表名词→最终可能发生的
inter之间+vent走+ion表名词→走在二者之间→干涉
invent发明,创造+ion表名词→n.发明, 创造
convention集会;习俗+ality表名词→n.陈规陋习,因袭传统
vent风→v.发泄[情绪],开孔 n.孔,口
ventilate[v.使通风;给…装通风设备]+ion表名词→n.通风
vent风→v.发泄[情绪],开孔 n.孔,口
vent风+ilate=ate表动词→v.使通风;给…装通风设备

means.word_mean: 充满大事的;多事故的;多变故的

sentences.en: The coming autumn should be eventful.
sentences.cn: 未来之秋将是多事之秋。
